title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: August 23, 2023, 02:09:54 PMLast edit: August 23, 2023, 03:52:59 PM by minerjones
content: For auction are a few coins made by CryptonicIn honor of Cryptonic, we are donating the proceeds to the UN Refugee Agency for Ukranian familieshttps://donate.unhcr.org/crypto/en/ukraine-emergency3 LOTS, each LOT has 3 coins and will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctions:Example bid: LOT 1: 1 @ 0.0001BTCLOT 1: 3x 2016 Cryptonic Monero Antique Brass, all ANACS MS68 jungle green slabsLOT 2: 3x 2016 Cryptonic Monero Antique Copper, all ANACS MS68 jungle green slabsLOT 3: 3x 2016 Cryptonic Monero Copper, all ANACS MS68 jungle green slabsSTARTING BID PER COIN PER LOT: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER COIN PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: AUGUST 29th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: OWLCATZ/MINERJONES

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on August 24, 2023, 01:06:54 PMYes! Thanks again, MJ... To be clear the backs all have this same design, just diff finishes. Good luck all and ty for the bids. These were coins that Cryptonic21 himself gave to me back in the day, and MJ submitted them for grading. Thanks again all, as some of you may know I'm an ardent supporter against this war, so figured funds should go here, but MJ please cut out the shipping fees on your behalf ofc.- Owl
